bug.author: kalpitthakkar-lm
bug.summary: TF1.15.0 has AddV2, TF1.14.0 had Add - compiler throws error

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kalpitthakkar-lm>@kalpitthakkar-lm</denchmark-link>
Thanks. This is the bug. I think it's can be fixed like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/pull/695>#695</denchmark-link> . Do you have a time to fix?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/iizukak>@iizukak</denchmark-link> Yes I can fix it. I will follow PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/pull/695>#695</denchmark-link> and submit a new PR for the bug fix, along with the updated status on compilation for FPGA of my TF1.15.0 QuantizedResnet model.
The mapping has been added by PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/blue-oil/blueoil/pull/717>#717</denchmark-link> . Closing this issue.
